rev.diff:
Line 292: Line 292:
'''Melanie "Mel" Doland''' is the wife of [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Greg Doland|Greg Doland]] and biological mother of [[Daniel Thomas (Emmerdale)|Daniel Thomas]]. She appeared from 2007 to 2008.
'''Melanie "Mel" Doland''' is the wife of [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Greg Doland|Greg Doland]] and biological mother of [[Daniel Thomas (Emmerdale)|Daniel Thomas]]. She appeared from 2007 to 2008.
â
Mel first appears along with Greg when she is giving birth at the same time as [[Laurel Thomas]]. Unbeknown to either couple, their babies are accidentally swapped at the hospital, and Mel's biological son, [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Daniel Thomas|Daniel]], goes home with Laurel and [[Ashley Thomas]], while Laurel's biological son, [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Arthur Thomas|Arthur]], goes home with the Dolands. The couples become friends and their children are baptised at the same time by [[Bishop George Postlethwaite]]. The Dolands become more frequent visitors to Emmerdale village when Greg, a builder, and [[Jack Sugden]] come to an arrangement for the redevelopment of [[List of residences in Emmerdale|Annie's Cottage]]. When Jack later sells Annie's Cottage, the Dolands buy it and move to the village.
+
Mel first appears along with Greg when she is giving birth at the same time as [[Laurel Thomas]]. Unbeknown to either couple, their babies are accidentally swapped at the hospital, and Mel's biological son, [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Daniel Thomas|Daniel]], goes home with Laurel and [[Ashley Thomas]], while Laurel's biological son, [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Arthur Thomas|Arthur]], goes home with the Dolands. The couples become friends and their children are baptised at the same time by [[Bishop George Postlethwaite]]. The Dolands become more frequent visitors to Emmerdale village when Greg, a builder, and [[Jack Sugden]] come to an arrangement for the redevelopment of Annie's Cottage. When Jack later sells Annie's Cottage, the Dolands buy it and move to the village.
On 21 February 2008, Daniel dies of cot death. Soon after, Laurel's mother [[Hilary Potts]] starts to suspect Arthur may be the Thomas' son not Greg and Mel's. They try and flee the country, but Ashley stops them. The police await their return, although they are not charged. Mel later runs away with Arthur on her own, but is later found. In June, the courts award custody of Arthur to his biological parents, Ashley and Laurel, leaving Mel particularly devastated. Over the coming weeks, Laurel has problems bonding with Arthur and Mel makes frequent visits to see Arthur. When Laurel finally bonds with Arthur, Greg and Mel leave the village as Mel realises there is no place for them anymore.
On 21 February 2008, Daniel dies of cot death. Soon after, Laurel's mother [[Hilary Potts]] starts to suspect Arthur may be the Thomas' son not Greg and Mel's. They try and flee the country, but Ashley stops them. The police await their return, although they are not charged. Mel later runs away with Arthur on her own, but is later found. In June, the courts award custody of Arthur to his biological parents, Ashley and Laurel, leaving Mel particularly devastated. Over the coming weeks, Laurel has problems bonding with Arthur and Mel makes frequent visits to see Arthur. When Laurel finally bonds with Arthur, Greg and Mel leave the village as Mel realises there is no place for them anymore.
Line 312: Line 312:
'''Gregory "Greg" Doland''' is the husband of [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Melanie Doland|Melanie Doland]], father of [[Jake Doland]] and biological father of [[Daniel Thomas (Emmerdale)|Daniel Thomas]]. He appeared from 2007 to 2008.
'''Gregory "Greg" Doland''' is the husband of [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Melanie Doland|Melanie Doland]], father of [[Jake Doland]] and biological father of [[Daniel Thomas (Emmerdale)|Daniel Thomas]]. He appeared from 2007 to 2008.
â
Greg first appears along with Mel when she is giving birth at the same time as [[Laurel Thomas]]. Unbeknown to either couple, their babies are accidentally swapped at the hospital, and Mel's biological son, [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Daniel Thomas|Daniel]], goes home with Laurel and [[Ashley Thomas]], while Laurel's biological son, [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Arthur Thomas|Arthur]], goes home with the Dolands. The couples become friends and their children are baptised at the same time by [[Bishop George Postlethwaite]]. The Dolands become more frequent visitors to Emmerdale village when Greg, a builder, and [[Jack Sugden]] come to an arrangement for the redevelopment of [[List of residences in Emmerdale|Annie's Cottage]]. When Jack later sells Annie's Cottage, the Dolands buy it and move to the village.
+
Greg first appears along with Mel when she is giving birth at the same time as [[Laurel Thomas]]. Unbeknown to either couple, their babies are accidentally swapped at the hospital, and Mel's biological son, [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Daniel Thomas|Daniel]], goes home with Laurel and [[Ashley Thomas]], while Laurel's biological son, [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Arthur Thomas|Arthur]], goes home with the Dolands. The couples become friends and their children are baptised at the same time by [[Bishop George Postlethwaite]]. The Dolands become more frequent visitors to Emmerdale village when Greg, a builder, and [[Jack Sugden]] come to an arrangement for the redevelopment of Annie's Cottage. When Jack later sells Annie's Cottage, the Dolands buy it and move to the village.
On 21 February 2008, Daniel dies of cot death. During a period when Laurel is estranged from Ashley, Greg tries to comfort her and she kisses him. A guilt-ridden Laurel returns to her husband and she and Greg promise to keep quiet about what had happened. Soon after Daniel's death, Laurel's mother [[Hilary Potts]] starts to suspect Arthur may be the Thomas' son not Greg and Mel's. They try and flee the country, but Ashley stops them. The police await their return, although they are not charged. Mel later runs away with Arthur on her own, only telling her stepson [[Jake Doland]] where she is. After a few weeks, Greg persuades her to come home. At a court hearing on 5 June, a judge decides to award custody of Arthur to his biological parents, Laurel and Ashley. Over the coming weeks, Laurel has problems bonding with Arthur and Mel makes frequent visits to visit him. Greg, however, does not visit Arthur, causing arguments between the couple. When Laurel finally bonds with Arthur, Greg and Mel leave the village as Mel realises there is no place for her anymore.
On 21 February 2008, Daniel dies of cot death. During a period when Laurel is estranged from Ashley, Greg tries to comfort her and she kisses him. A guilt-ridden Laurel returns to her husband and she and Greg promise to keep quiet about what had happened. Soon after Daniel's death, Laurel's mother [[Hilary Potts]] starts to suspect Arthur may be the Thomas' son not Greg and Mel's. They try and flee the country, but Ashley stops them. The police await their return, although they are not charged. Mel later runs away with Arthur on her own, only telling her stepson [[Jake Doland]] where she is. After a few weeks, Greg persuades her to come home. At a court hearing on 5 June, a judge decides to award custody of Arthur to his biological parents, Laurel and Ashley. Over the coming weeks, Laurel has problems bonding with Arthur and Mel makes frequent visits to visit him. Greg, however, does not visit Arthur, causing arguments between the couple. When Laurel finally bonds with Arthur, Greg and Mel leave the village as Mel realises there is no place for her anymore.
Line 406: Line 406:
'''Jake Doland''' is the son of [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Greg Doland|Greg Doland]]. He appeared from 2007 to 2009, when his character was axed.<ref>http://www.digitalspy.co.uk/soaps/a155116/three-emmerdale-characters-to-leave.html</ref>
'''Jake Doland''' is the son of [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Greg Doland|Greg Doland]]. He appeared from 2007 to 2009, when his character was axed.<ref>http://www.digitalspy.co.uk/soaps/a155116/three-emmerdale-characters-to-leave.html</ref>
â
Jake first appears when visiting the village for the [[infant baptism|christening]] of his half brother [[List of minor Emmerdale characters#Arthur Thomas|Arthur]] in December 2007. He is also Arthur's godfather. Jake's mother had died when he was a child. Greg had remarried to [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Melanie Doland|Melanie]]. He returns in January 2008 to help his father with the re-building of [[List of residences in Emmerdale#Annie's Cottage|Annie's Cottage]]. Jake does not take to building so when [[Jack Sugden]] offers him a job on Butler's Farm, helping out after [[Andy Sugden]] goes to jail, Jake agrees. [[Victoria Sugden]] soon takes a liking to Jake, but he only thinks of her as a friend. With Andy in prison, Jake sets his sights on his fiancÃ©e, [[Jo Sugden|Jo Stiles]], but [[Sam Dingle]] tells him to leave her alone. Jake continues working in the background until Andy fires him in June 2008.
+
Jake first appears when visiting the village for the [[infant baptism|christening]] of his half brother [[List of minor Emmerdale characters#Arthur Thomas|Arthur]] in December 2007. He is also Arthur's godfather. Jake's mother had died when he was a child. Greg had remarried to [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Melanie Doland|Melanie]]. He returns in January 2008 to help his father with the re-building of Annie's Cottage. Jake does not take to building so when [[Jack Sugden]] offers him a job on Butler's Farm, helping out after [[Andy Sugden]] goes to jail, Jake agrees. [[Victoria Sugden]] soon takes a liking to Jake, but he only thinks of her as a friend. With Andy in prison, Jake sets his sights on his fiancÃ©e, [[Jo Sugden|Jo Stiles]], but [[Sam Dingle]] tells him to leave her alone. Jake continues working in the background until Andy fires him in June 2008.
In early-2008 Greg and Mel learn that Arthur is possibly not their son as the hospital are investigating a possible baby swap with [[Ashley Thomas|Ashley]] and [[Laurel Thomas]]'s baby [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Daniel Doland-Thomas|Daniel]]. Jake assists his dad and Mel in their efforts to go on the run. When thwarted at the airport, Mel runs off with Arthur, but keeps in touch with Jake. Greg later finds out and convinces her to come home. Weeks later DNA test results prove Arthur is Ashley and Laurel's son and custody of him is awarded to the Thomas's. Daniel, the Dolands biological son, died in February 2008. They leave town several weeks later to live in [[Spain]], but Jake decides to stay in Emmerdale.
In early-2008 Greg and Mel learn that Arthur is possibly not their son as the hospital are investigating a possible baby swap with [[Ashley Thomas|Ashley]] and [[Laurel Thomas]]'s baby [[List of minor Emmerdale characters (2007)#Daniel Doland-Thomas|Daniel]]. Jake assists his dad and Mel in their efforts to go on the run. When thwarted at the airport, Mel runs off with Arthur, but keeps in touch with Jake. Greg later finds out and convinces her to come home. Weeks later DNA test results prove Arthur is Ashley and Laurel's son and custody of him is awarded to the Thomas's. Daniel, the Dolands biological son, died in February 2008. They leave town several weeks later to live in [[Spain]], but Jake decides to stay in Emmerdale.
